name: Pizza Time! (lancethecat)
description:
Race down hallways, kick down doors and launch pizzas directly into the faces of satisfied customers! Shave precious seconds off your score with each new run to get the fastest time possible!

Basically an FPS where your bullets are pizzas, and also everything's covered in neon.

Thanks for playing my first game on itch.io! I'm going to keep updating this game so I'd love to hear any feedback!

Music / Instrumental by Aries Beats
